titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Michigan Society of the War of 1812 records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

corpname.primary_name: Michigan Society of the War of 1812

did.unittitle: Michigan Society of the War of 1812 records

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: The Michigan Society of the War of 1812 (sometimes identified as the Society of the War of 1812 in the State of Michigan) was founded in 1946, affiliated with the General Society of the War of 1812. Members are descendants of veterans of the War of 1812.

corpname.primary_name: Michigan Society of the War of 1812
